Diversifiers Used:

  1. New Tech : VR; Oculus Rift 
  2. Non-Verbal Communication : puzzles are communicated via symbols in a book; only verbal communication is ambient music & noise meant to drive the player insane; this is part of the overall experience & does not communicate any hints, rules, etc. 
  3. Who made it better? Competed against Kevin, Austin, & Peter's team to make a VR Horror experience. 
  4. Lose to Win: there is no real win condition; the player either goes insane or the game times out; even if you do manage to complete all the puzzles, insanity is an inevitability.
